title: ðŸš¨Texans trade DeAndre Hopkins to Cardinals in blockbuster deal - Emergency Podcast (Football 3/16)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react a blockbuster NFL trade, as the Texans are dealing All-Pro wide receiver DeAndre Hopkins to the Cardinals in exchange for David Johnson and picks. The guys share their utter disbelief over the deal, criticize Bill O'Brien's role in the move and take a look at what it means for both sides as well as Houston QB Deshaun Watson.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
